ns2:testcase.ns3:title: 2.41.QA.01 SET Profile Information -Direct Connect (Table Options)
ns2:testcase.ns3:description:
The following four options preceded by a checkbox shall be displayed horizontally for each account row.
Download – By default this checkbox shall be checked for each account and user shall be allowed to uncheck selected accounts. User is required to have at least one account selected for download.
*Note: User shall not be able to select the Transfer From/To and Bill Pay checkboxes unless the download checkbox has been selected.
Transfer From – By default this checkbox shall not be checked and user is not required to select this option for any of their eligible accounts.
Transfer To – By default this checkbox shall not be checked and user is not required to select this option for any of their eligible accounts.
NOTE: Use 3.7 transfer rules to determine if account is eligible for transfer from and transfer to functionality. The checkboxes shall be grayed out for the accounts that are not eligible.
This Bill Pay column shall only be displayed if the user selected to enroll in Direct Connect w/Bill Pay.
Bill Pay - By default this checkbox shall not be checked and user is not required to select this option for any of their eligible accounts.
NOTE: Use Bill Pay eligibility rules to determine if account is an eligible bill pay account. The checkboxes shall be grayed out for the accounts that are not eligible.
Error Text:
You must select at least one account to be enabled for download.
Preconditions: SET Should be available.
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: svc-rtcmigration
